DataElement.preferredName: Biopsy Sample Not Submitted Reason Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A free text field used to describe the reason a biopsy specimen was not submitted.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information pertaining to a message submitted for the judgment of others of a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes of a pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.

Concepts.definition: The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.:Submission; a message submitted for the judgment of others.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
Something submitted for the judgment or consideration of others.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: indication of the presence and extent of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Biopsy Specimen Not Submitted Reason Text
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A free text field used to describe the reason a biopsy sample was not submitted.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Biopsy Specimen Not Submitted Reason Text
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Removal and pathologic examination of specimens in the form of small pieces of tissue from the living body.:Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.:An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Submitted; referred for judgment or consideration.:An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: The removal of tissue specimens or fluid from the living body for microscopic examination, performed to establish a diagnosis.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.
An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
